job.title: Senior Data Scientist-Supply Chain
job.description: pOne of the most recognized brands in the world is looking to hire a Senior Data Scientist to join their Advanced Analytics team focused on directtoconsumer business ppbrppThe Senior Data Scientist will collaborate with a team of data scientists and business stakeholders  to clearly communicate meaningful insights to internal audiences This person will have the ability to tell a story with datappnbspppnbspResponsibilitiesppbrpullispanPlay a crucial role in understanding their customers through detailed analysisspanlilispanDevelop statisticaleconometric methods machine learning techniques and big data solutions to forecast consumer demand and determine optimal level of investment in various stages of the supply chainnbspspanliliAssess business requirements and constraints to make tradeoff recommendations between speed and accuracy of alternative solution approachesnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspliliIdentify and apply appropriate methods to acquire explore cleanse and fuse data from different sourcesnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspliliSupport the adoption of analytic products through effective storytelling and collaboration with key partnersliliPartner with Demand and Supply Management as well as Data Science and EngineeringliulpbrppnbspppRequiredppbrpulli510 years of related Analytic Data Science experienceliliMS in Statistics Mathematics Economics Computer Science or related field liliExpert live Python SQL Machine Learning and Predictive ModelingliliAbility to tell a story with dataliul
